support.title: Support Centre
support.subtitle: We're here to help you get the most out of ZARZOOM.
support.faq1q: How do I connect my social media accounts?
support.faq1a: Navigate to your Dashboard, click 'Connected Accounts', and follow the prompts to authorise each platform. We support Facebook, Instagram, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, and TikTok.
support.faq2q: Can I schedule posts in advance?
support.faq2a: Absolutely. Our calendar view lets you schedule content weeks or even months ahead. Simply create your post, pick a date and time, and ZARZOOM handles the rest.
support.faq3q: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
support.faq3a: You'll receive a notification when you approach your limit. You can upgrade your plan at any time from the Account Settings page, and the change takes effect immediately.
support.faq4a: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption for data at rest and in transit. We never share your data with third parties. See our Privacy Policy for full details.
support.contactText: Our support team typically responds within 24 hours on business days.

termsUser.title: User Terms & Conditions
termsUser.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using ZARZOOM.
termsUser.s1Text: By creating an account or using the ZARZOOM platform, you agree to be bound by these User Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree, you must not use the service.
termsUser.s2Text: You must provide accurate, complete information when registering. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activity that occurs under your account.
termsUser.s3Text: You agree not to use ZARZOOM to post content that is unlawful, defamatory, obscene, or infringes the intellectual property rights of others. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate this policy.
termsUser.s4Text: Paid plans are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. You may cancel at any time; cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. Refunds are not provided for partial periods.
termsUser.s5Text: You retain ownership of content you create and publish through ZARZOOM. By using the platform, you grant us a limited licence to process, store, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the service.
termsUser.s6Text: ZARZOOM is provided on an 'as-is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties and shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
termsUser.s7Text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes are published constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.s1Text: We collect information you provide directly (name, email, payment details) and information generated automatically (IP address, browser type, usage data) when you use ZARZOOM.
privacy.s2Text: We use your information to provide and improve the service, process payments, send service-related communications, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.s3Text: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with trusted service providers (payment processors, hosting providers) who assist us in operating the platform, subject to strict confidentiality agreements.
privacy.s4Text: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide the service. You may request deletion of your data at any time by contacting support.
privacy.s5Text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also object to processing or request data portability. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@zarzoom.com.
privacy.s6Text: We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments.
privacy.s7Text: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes via email or through the platform.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.s1Text: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and understand how you use it.
cookies.s2EssentialText: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled. They include session cookies and authentication tokens.
cookies.s2AnalyticsText: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous usage data. We use this to improve our service.
cookies.s2PreferenceText: Remember your settings and preferences (such as language choice) to provide a more personalised experience.
cookies.s3Text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website.
cookies.s4Text: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies. Please refer to the respective third-party privacy policies for more information.
cookies.s5Text: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@zarzoom.com.
